title: On the stability of finite-volume schemes on non-uniform meshes
abstract:
In this paper, we study the L2 stability of high-order finite-volume schemes
for the 1D transport equation on non-uniform meshes. We consider the case when
a small periodic perturbation is applied to a uniform mesh. For this case, we
establish a sufficient stability condition. This allows to prove the (p+1)-th
order convergence of finite-volume schemes based on p-th order polynomials.
